moduleInfo.moduleTitle: Advanced Theory and Practices/01 Foundations of Manufacturing Authority/Foundations of Building Authority Online

overview.quote: Real authority comes from consistently delivering value and building genuine connections with your audience over time.
overview.introText: In this module, we'll explore the fundamental principles of building authority in the digital landscape. You'll learn how to establish credibility, connect with your audience, and position yourself as the go-to expert in your niche.

keyTerms.definition: The process of positioning yourself as a trusted expert in your niche through consistent value delivery and authentic engagement.
Evidence-based trust established through sharing relevant experience, qualifications, and proof that validates your expertise.
Regular posting schedule and maintaining a coherent message, voice, and value system across all content.
Highly engaged followers who actively promote your content and defend you in comments, creating vital social proof.
The personal relationship formed between creator and viewer through authenticity, engagement, and value-driven content.

actionPlan: Identify your 3 core credentials to share
Create a credibility statement for videos
Respond to 10 comments with thoughtful replies

mainContent.title: The Foundation of Authority
mainContent.text: True authority begins with establishing credibility. Share your relevant experience and qualifications authentically, without coming across as boastful. Back up claims with concrete examples and case studies that prove your expertise.

mainContent.title: Communication That Connects
mainContent.text: Speak to your camera like you're talking to a respected friend. Maintain clear speech, confident tone, and steady eye contact. This one-to-one connection makes viewers feel like they're getting personal advice from an expert they trust.

summaryPoints: Talk as if to one person, not many
Maintain eye contact with the lens

mainContent.title: Community Building
mainContent.text: Respond thoughtfully to comments, showing genuine interest in your audience's thoughts. This not only builds loyalty with commenters but shows others they should engage too. Early engaged followers become your biggest promoters.

mainContent.title: The Power of Consistency
mainContent.text: Choose a realistic posting schedule and stick to it. Equally important is consistency in your persona, messaging, and values. This reliability builds trust over time and makes your authority feel authentic rather than manufactured.

proTips.text: Share failures alongside successes. Vulnerability creates relatability, and showing your learning journey makes your expertise more believable.
When shooting videos, imagine a specific person sitting just behind your camera to make your delivery more natural and engaging.

finalWords.emphasis: Authority is built brick by brick
finalWords.description: Focus on serving your audience first, and the authority will follow naturally.
